By clarifying our individual roles, we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead, and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come. `` Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade,'' adds Larry Page .`` The results speak for themselves. been burned for three straight games of at least 40 points by the 76ers All-Star.`` Honestly, they play me one-on-one, straight up,'' Allen Iverson said of a Bucks' defense he penetrated at will. Except in the last quarter. Elgin Baylor guess they felt like they had to do something. By then, it was too late. Allen Iverson reached 40 points against the Bucks for the sixth time in his career, his most against any opponent. He had 40 and 54 points in his previous two games
